WorkItem.Description:
Hi.  I installed TS v.1.4 .
When i write code and ctrl + s   it export true .js file.

but   x.js file not imported to your project because of  when publish your project, there isn't x.js file.
this file is missing.

is this a bug ?
WorkItem.Summary: when site publish with vs2013 typescript plugin problem

Comments.Message:
Hi SARGIN,

A couple points:

You may want to update your links.  The current TypeScript repo is now on GitHub: https://github.com/microsoft/typescript.  You can submit issues at: https://github.com/microsoft/typescript/issues

The .js files you mention are not added to the project because they're considered not part of the project.  One way to think of it is that since TypeScript is the compiler, the source of truth is the .ts file.  The .js files are like .exe or .dll files, they're the output of the compiler, which generally isn't put in the project.

Hope that helps.
